feed.title: Terra Nova (National Park) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: FROST ADVISORY IN EFFECT, Terra Nova (National Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:55 PM NDT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Current Conditions: 11.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Terra Nova National Park 5:30 PM NDT Saturday 10 September 2016
Temperature: 11.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa rising
Humidity: 69 %
Dewpoint: 5.9°C
Wind: NE 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low plus 5 except plus 1 in low lying areas. Patchy frost.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing this evening. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low plus 5 except plus 1 in low lying areas. Patchy frost. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Sunday: Increasing cloudiness. High 17.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High 17. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Sunday night: Showers. Low 12 with temperature rising to 17 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Showers beginning in the evening. Amount 2 mm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 before morning. Low 12 with temperature rising to 17 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Saturday 10 September 2016
